block.p: Helen Kathleen Barzun, a daughter of Dr. Kathleen and Dr. James Barzun of Harvard, Mass., was married at her parents' house yesterday to Bryan George Adams, a son of the Rev. Hope Eakins of Essex, Conn., and Daniel N. Adams Jr. of West Redding, Conn. The Rev. William Eakins, who is the bridegroom's stepfather and the rector of Trinity Episcopal Church in Hartford, performed the ceremony.

Mr. and Mrs. Adams work for Trinity College in Hartford. The bride, 22, is an assistant in the Community Learning Initiative, a department that combines classroom work with community projects. The bridegroom, 32, is the data network administrator in the technical services department. The bride, who is known as Kate, is a graduate of Trinity, where the bridegroom is a candidate for a bachelor's degree.

Helen Kathleen Barzun, a daughter of Dr. Kathleen and Dr. James Barzun of Harvard, Mass., was married at her parents' house yesterday to Bryan George Adams, a son of the Rev. Hope Eakins of Essex, Conn., and Daniel N. Adams Jr. of West Redding, Conn. The Rev. William Eakins, who is the bridegroom's stepfather and the rector of Trinity Episcopal Church in Hartford, performed the ceremony.

Mr. and Mrs. Adams work for Trinity College in Hartford. The bride, 22, is an assistant in the Community Learning Initiative, a department that combines classroom work with community projects. The bridegroom, 32, is the data network administrator in the technical services department. The bride, who is known as Kate, is a graduate of Trinity, where the bridegroom is a candidate for a bachelor's degree.

The bride's father, an internist, has a private practice in Ayer, Mass. Her mother, a retired psychiatrist, practiced in Ayer. The bride is a granddaughter of Jacques Barzun, the historian and author of ''From Dawn to Decadence'' and other books.

The bridegroom's mother is the rector of St. John's Episcopal Church in Essex, Conn. His father owns a marketing company in Danbury bearing his name. The bridegroom's stepmother, Camilla Adams, owns Camelot Labradors, a kennel in Barneveld, N.Y.
